metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17571 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Included in Log4j 1.2 is a SocketServer class that is vulnerable to deserialization of untrusted data which can be exploited to remotely execute arbitrary code when combined with a deserialization gadget when listening to untrusted network traffic for log data. This affects Log4j versions up to 1.2 up to 1.2.17.

criterions.comment: apache-log4j1.2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.17-9').
